Bud Rot.prevention: Improve drainage; avoid water stagnation; apply Bordeaux mixture during monsoon.

Crown Choking.prevention: Ensure proper nutrient supply and manage nematodes early.

Leaf Spot / Blight.prevention: Remove and destroy infected leaves; ensure proper spacing and aeration.

Grey Leaf Blight.prevention: Prune infected fronds; maintain hygiene in plantation.

Yellow Leaf.prevention: Monitor and control plant hoppers; use certified disease-free seedlings.

Lethal Yellowing.prevention: Avoid planting in endemic regions; plant resistant varieties.

Tanjore Wilt.prevention: Avoid injuries to roots; improve soil aeration; apply organic amendments.

steam bleeding.prevention: Avoid mechanical injuries; apply protective paste regularly.

red ring.prevention: Monitor and manage weevil vectors regularly.

bole root.prevention: Maintain good drainage; remove and destroy infected parts.

Basal Stem Rot / Root Rot.prevention: Avoid waterlogging; use disease-free planting material.

Wilt Disease / Root Wilt.prevention: Monitor pests like red palm weevil; apply organic soil conditioners.

anaberoga.prevention: Maintain soil pH and fertility; prevent fungal attacks with bioagents.

medicine: Seed treatment with Thiram or Captan
Seed Rot.prevention: Use well-drained nursery beds; treat seeds before sowing.

Seedling Blight.prevention: Avoid overcrowding; maintain hygiene and airflow in nursery.

Other.prevention: Maintain overall tree health and hygiene.

Healthy.prevention: Continue regular care; monitor for early signs of disease or pests.

root wilt.prevention: Improve soil aeration; avoid overwatering; manage nutrient balance.

rhinoceros.prevention: Regular monitoring and removal of beetles; clean crown region.

White Spot.prevention: Avoid overhead irrigation; improve ventilation and reduce humidity.
